definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: The little child stammers in the presence of strangers.
sentences.chinese: 那小阿在陌生人面前说话就结巴。

sentences.english: "Well, stranger, " Pappy said, "that was first-class fiddling.
sentences.chinese: “陌生人”，帕皮说，“那是一流的演奏。

sentences.english: The social worker had to deal with the poor family's mistrust of strangers.
sentences.chinese: 该社工人员必须应付这户穷苦人家对陌生人的不信任。

sentences.english: When the stranger came, and it will bark cried let us know.
sentences.chinese: 当陌生人来了，它会汪汪叫着告诉我们。

sentences.english: We can choose to have a relationship or not.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以选择建立联系或者做对方的陌生人。

sentences.english: I do not remember talking to the stranger.
sentences.chinese: 我不记得曾同这位陌生人谈过话。

sentences.english: The boy glowered at the stranger.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩气呼呼地看着陌生人。

sentences.english: C. I'm usually the first person to strike up a conversation with strangers.
sentences.chinese: 我通常是最先与陌生人攀谈的人。

sentences.english: You can ask a stranger for chocolate without getting your face slapped.
sentences.chinese: 你可以向从未照过面的陌生人要巧克力。

sentences.english: A stranger accosted him on the bus.
sentences.chinese: 一位陌生人在公共汽车上同他搭讪。

sentences.english: Can undressing a stranger lead to love?
sentences.chinese: 给陌生人宽衣解带可以带来爱情吗？

sentences.english: She gave ingenuous answers to all of the strangers' questions.
sentences.chinese: 她诚实地回答了所有陌生人提出的问题。

sentences.english: I gave the stranger the double-O.
sentences.chinese: 我仔细的大量了这个陌生人。

sentences.english: Deaf peple sometimes find it hard to get through to strangers.
sentences.chinese: 聋子有时很难使陌生人理解他们。

sentences.english: She gave ingenuous answers to the strangers' entire question.
sentences.chinese: 她心底坦然回答了这位陌生人的全部询问。

sentences.english: The woman was startled to see a stranger.
sentences.chinese: 那位产妇发现是位陌生人，惊跳起来。

definition: to make friends/(dialect) to start an affair with sb
to have never met sb before (idiom); entirely unacquainted/a complete stranger/not to know sb from Adam
the opposite sex/of the opposite sex/heterosexual/different in nature
